long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will automatically refresh the charts on your Zoho Creator page. By installing this extension, your Zoho Creator charts will update their data every 10 seconds. No longer will you need to refresh your entire dashboard to keep your charts up to date!
